sourcesContent:
import style from '../cssmodules/SingleRecipeMod.module.css' import Sidebar from './Sidebar' import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import axios from 'axios' const SingleRecipe = () => { const [recipe,setRecipe] = useState({}); const {recipeId} = useParams() useEffect(()=>{ console.log(recipeId) const url = `http://localhost:3000/recipes/${recipeId}` console.log(url) axios.get(url) .then(res => { console.log(res) setRecipe(res.data) }) .catch(err=>{ console.log(err) }) }, []) return(

{recipe.title}

{recipe.description}

Ingredienser

    {recipe.ingredients.map((ingredient:any) =>
  • {ingredient.name}
    • )}

Instruktioner

    {recipe.instructions.map((instruction:any) =>
  1. {instruction}
    2. )}
Fem
)} export default SingleRecipe
